content: अवनिः --नी {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [अव्-अनि <ls>Uṇ. 2. 101</ls>] {@--1@} The earth; oft used at the end of <ab>comp.</ab> meaning ‘ground’, ‘place’; काननावनौ <ls>Dk. 7</ls>, <ls n="Dk.">13</ls>; लीलावनौ place of recreation <ls n="Dk.">25.</ls> {@--2@} A finger (<ls>Nir.</ls>). {@--3@} A river; <ls>Rv. 1. 190. 7.</ls> {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of a plant. {@--5@} Course, bed of a river. अवनिंगत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} fallen prostrate on the ground.
